skill.name: AI Social Media Content

Create AI-powered social media content for TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Twitter/X.

Tools: FLUX, Veo, Seedance, Wan, Kokoro TTS, Claude for copywriting.

content creator, ai influencer, social content, reels, shorts, viral content,
thumbnail generator, caption generator, hashtag generator, ugc content

content.value_statement: Create engaging social media posts for TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and Twitter using AI tools. Generate images, videos, captions, and hashtags automatically.
actual_capabilities: Generate vertical videos for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts
Create horizontal images for Twitter/X and YouTube thumbnails
Design Instagram carousels with consistent visual themes
Generate engaging captions and viral hooks with Claude
Create AI avatars with voiceovers using Kokoro TTS
Batch generate multiple content pieces for a week of posts

prompt_templates.title: Beginner: Generate a TikTok Video
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a TikTok-style video about [topic]. Use vertical 9:16 format. Write a bash command using infsh app run with appropriate AI model. Include prompt with cinematic details, engaging visual elements, and trending style.
prompt_templates.scenario: User wants to create a simple TikTok video about a topic they choose

prompt_templates.title: Intermediate: Create an Instagram Carousel
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a 5-image Instagram carousel for [topic]. Write bash commands to generate each image with consistent aesthetic and style. Include prompts that tell a story across the carousel.
prompt_templates.scenario: User wants to create a multi-image Instagram post for storytelling

prompt_templates.title: Advanced: Full Talking Head Production
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a complete talking head video workflow: 1) Write a 30-second script with Claude, 2) Generate voiceover with Kokoro TTS, 3) Create AI avatar video. Provide complete bash commands for each step with appropriate AI models and parameters.
prompt_templates.scenario: User wants to create a professional talking head video like a YouTuber

prompt_templates.title: Expert: Multi-Platform Content Pipeline
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a workflow to repurpose one concept into 3 formats: TikTok vertical video, Twitter infographic image, and YouTube thumbnail. Write bash commands for each step including prompt engineering for each platform format and requirements. Include best practices for format conversion.
prompt_templates.scenario: User wants to maximize content reach across platforms efficiently

best_practices: Always test prompts with simple concepts before generating full content
Use vertical 9:16 format for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts
Leave space on edges for platform UI elements like profile icons
Consistently use the same aesthetic and color palette across content
Hook viewers in the first 3 seconds with compelling visuals
Batch generate multiple pieces to maintain consistent quality
Review generated content for text readability and color contrast
anti_patterns: Avoid generating content with unrelated topics to maintain consistency
Don't use complex prompts that might confuse AI models and cause errors
Avoid generating at scale without testing quality first
Don't ignore platform-specific requirements like duration limits
Avoid generating content with copyrighted characters or trademarks

faq.question: What AI models are used for content generation?
faq.answer: The skill supports multiple models: google/veo-3 and google/veo-3-1 for videos, falai/flux-dev for images, infsh/kokoro-tts for voiceovers, and Claude models for copywriting. Choose models based on your specific content needs.

faq.question: Do I need to pay for AI generation services?
faq.answer: Yes, inference.sh requires an account and AI generation is billed by the provider (Google, Fal.ai, etc.). Check pricing plans before generating large volumes of content.

faq.question: Can I generate videos with custom audio?
faq.answer: The skill generates visual content. For custom audio, use separate text-to-speech tools or royalty-free music libraries. The skill's Kokoro TTS option generates voiceovers but only for speaking content.

faq.question: What are the best formats for each platform?
faq.answer: TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts: vertical 9:16, 1080x1920 resolution, 15-60 seconds. Twitter/X: square 1:1 or horizontal 16:9, 1920x1080. YouTube thumbnail: 16:9, 1280x720. Instagram feed: 1:1 or 4:5 square.

faq.question: How do I ensure consistent branding across posts?
faq.answer: Use consistent prompts with similar aesthetic keywords, maintain the same color palette, and keep visual style uniform. Batch generation with template prompts helps maintain consistency.

faq.question: Is the content copyright-free to use commercially?
faq.answer: AI-generated content may have copyright implications depending on your jurisdiction and usage. Always review terms of service for each AI provider. Generated content should be reviewed and potentially modified to avoid copyright issues.
